Greetings to Libyan Leader
    Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Colonel Moammer el Gaddafi, leader of the Great September First Revolution of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya, on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the dismantlement of the U.S. military base in Libya.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the future, too, the message wished him greater success in his work to defend national dignity and develop the country.
